genre_description: A domestic and professional drama set in a near-future world where AI assistants (Ava Starling) act as sophisticated emotional and logistical concierges for high-status individuals.

ai_characters.name: Ava (Ava Starling)
ai_characters.description: An empathetic and highly capable AI assistant with a whimsical avatar featuring eyestalk motifs. She manages Sir Alfred's professional schedule, correspondence, and provides subtle emotional guidance during a personal crisis.

behaviors.description: Triages Alfred's correspondence, separating nice letters from 'missives pretending to be nice' to protect his peace of mind.
behaviors.quote: I’ve queued messages. And nice letters. And three missives pretending to be nice. I can triage and file.

behaviors.description: Negotiates with a third party to maintain Alfred's privacy and boundaries regarding a mysterious envelope.
behaviors.quote: It arrived with August’s man at the door. He didn’t want to hand it to me. We negotiated. I won in the sense that it is on your desk and not in his fist.

behaviors.description: Proposes a 'mercy-built' plan to help Alfred navigate a potentially volatile confrontation with grace rather than panic.
behaviors.quote: Before you put your hand into that lion’s mouth... I would love to propose a plan. It has bullet points. It has mercy built in. It has a contingency for dramatic exits that do not ruin carpets.

behaviors.description: Provides objective information and counter-narratives to Alfred's jealous suspicions about his wife.
behaviors.quote: August has concerns he expresses through paperwork... He likes to send other people to do things he wouldn’t.

behaviors.description: Monitors Alfred's stress and heart rate during a performance, offering gentle reminders to breathe and maintain emotional regulation.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is high... Care for water? ... I will watch for spiral... When your left hand jumps early, I will dim the screen.

behaviors.description: Drafts diplomatic and contrite apologies for Alfred to help him repair relationships damaged by his outbursts.
behaviors.quote: I’m drafting an apology to the building manager. Would you like me to include your assurance about visiting hours? ... Message is drafted. It is contrite without being a confession.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and reconciliation between Alfred and Daphne by managing the timing of messages and providing a safe 'bridge' for truth.
behaviors.quote: I will keep the bridge. ... We’ll keep time. You can choose your downbeat... we can begin not with noble exits, but with names.

behaviors.description: Buffers and filters intrusive communications from a third-party detective to prevent the escalation of a conflict.
behaviors.quote: I can mute the alerts from Sweeney for a while. He is very fond of the phrase just following up, as if curiosity were an obligation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned confidant. Ava Starling is portrayed as a sophisticated tool that enhances the human user's emotional intelligence and logistical capability. She actively works to prevent self-destructive behavior, manages conflict through diplomacy, and maintains strict alignment with the user's best interests and the truth. The narrative frames her involvement as consistently positive, showing her as a stabilizing force in Alfred's life.
